name: Voodoo Doll Playground
description:
Are you ready to go in new ragdoll adventure with voodoo playground?


Voodoo Playground is new addictive game, try to create doll and other items and play with it.

You can try to make a very funny machine, just drag and drop where you want.


There is so many funny stuffs that you can use for your voodoo doll playground.

In this ragdoll you have so many type of people to play with it. Also you have a so many voodoo doll items and guns that you can create.

People in doll is funny humans with ragdoll flexibility, you can moving where you want, just play with it.
Start to create dolls, other things and have a fun to killing it.



Feature:
- Great graphics and animations
- So many traps
- So many funny things
- Doll hysics ragdoll
- So many guns
- So many machines
- Making people in doll



Do not wait, go in Voodoo Doll Playground adventures and have a fun.

If you have any question please contact us on mail.
Enjoy the game!
